channel.title: Sponserd
channel.description: Will i get my sponserd server back? Since the mysql database crash will we get our sponserd back i paid 315$ for my sponsered

item.title: Sponserd
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“AMERIKA, post:23, topic:317204”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=413747.msg3047990#msg3047990 date=1259894480]
Well, it’s for a good purpose. Hopefully soon some great server will be released to the public and paid for by this money and there won’t be a need for sponsored servers anymore.
[/quote]

you need to talk to moparisthebest.com . You wont find anyone worth it here, excluding a few.[/quote]

People from there are aware of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponserd
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Don’t worry, I’m not out to screw anyone over. I’m sorry the database went and I have no record of the transactions besides what you guys paid into the paypal account. For the people who purchased a month of sponsored server time, since you were screwed out of 8 days would a 33% refund be fair? (since 8 days is actually less than 10, which would be 33% of a month?)

And of course you are free to bid right now for the next month starting on the 10th.

Read full topic
